introduction: Rubén rides the familiar path down to the beach. Today he’d decided to grab his bike to enjoy the sea air, something he can’t do everyday. What Rubén doesn’t know is what will soon be unchained by an encounter behind the rocks with a man named Paco. Julia practices Yoga on her top roof, out of sight of the beach but today there’s something new in her husband when he returns from his ride in the afternoon. That afternoon that will change a relationship between two people forever
